title: Last Week's Top Stories - America Reckons with Racism & COVID-19 Makes a Comeback
itunes:title: Last Week's Top Stories - America Reckons with Racism & COVID-19 Makes a Comeback
description:
NASCAR bans the Confederate flag, cops use excessive force on demonstrators protesting police brutality, America's COVID-19 cases spike, and Georgians face voter suppression.
